title: oc 5.0.13 loading files between 1 gb and 4gb
body:
i have a similar problem. when set 1 gb upload works fine, when set 2 gb or 3 gb gb an error (when i send any size file). how to set 4 gb+ it also works. 
i checked and i have everything set as in the description of the http://forum.owncloud.org/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=7733

i have a php 5.5.1 & debian 7, php  5.3.4 debian 6
```
the uploaded file exceeds the max_file_size directive that was specified in the html form
```

log error apache
```
[error] [client xx.xx.xx.xx] negotiation: discovered file(s) matching request: /var/www/free/settings/admin (none could be negotiated)., referer: http://adress/index.php/apps/files
[fri nov 15 11:26:48 2013] 
[error] [client xx.xx.xx.xx] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/free/data/htaccesstest.txt
[fri nov 15 11:26:54 2013] 
[error] [client xx.xx.xx.xx] negotiation: discovered file(s) matching request: /var/www/free/settings/admin (none could be negotiated)., referer: http://adress/index.php/settings/admin
[fri nov 15 11:26:54 2013] [error] 
[client xx.xx.xx.xx] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/free/data/htaccesstest.txt
```
